channel.title: CVE Feed for Delta Electronics -- DIAScreen
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Delta Electronics -- DIAScreen

item.title: CVE-2023-0250|2024-08-02T05:02:44.062Z -- delta%20electronics -- diascreen
item.description: Delta Electronics DIAScreen versions 1.2.1.23 and prior are vulnerable to a stack-based buffer overflow, which could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-5068|2024-08-02T07:44:53.703Z -- delta%20electronics -- diascreen
item.description: Delta Electronics DIAScreen may write past the end of an allocated buffer while parsing a specially crafted input file. This could allow an attacker to execute code in the context of the current process.

item.title: CVE-2023-0249|2024-08-02T05:02:44.097Z -- delta%20electronics -- diascreen
item.description: Delta Electronics DIAScreen versions 1.2.1.23 and prior are vulnerable to out-of-bounds write, which may allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.

item.title: CVE-2023-0251|2024-08-02T05:02:44.084Z -- delta%20electronics -- diascreen
item.description: Delta Electronics DIAScreen versions 1.2.1.23 and prior are vulnerable to a buffer overflow through improper restrictions of operations within memory, which could allow an attacker to remotely execute arbitrary code.
